question.questionText: Look at the diagram of a circuit at the right. Will the motor run? Why?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The circuit is not complete. The electrical pathway is broken.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: I chose it because all the wires have to be hooked together to make a circuit.
